content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Fragment
worn notebook

# Context
He carried it in his jacket pocket. <fragment>worn notebook</fragment> The cover was held together with tape.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Fragment
rain-soaked banner

# Context
Volunteers tried to dry it under a tent. <fragment>rain-soaked banner</fragment> Wind kept pushing the fabric.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Spanish

# Target Fragment
faint heartbeat

# Context
The medic leaned closer with a stethoscope. <fragment>faint heartbeat</fragment> The room fell silent.
